Claim: "There is a guy holding a football."
Implication: "A guy with a football is being watched by a crowd."
Referring expressions: guy, football  A guy, football, crowd
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsHolding(b) and IsAFootball(a))) & (forall f (forall e ( IsWithFootball(e) ->   IsAFootball(f))))) -> (exists c (exists d (IsWithFootball(c) and IsBeingWatchedBy(d))))
